text: Dreams is an American sitcom that aired on CBS from October 3 to October 31, 1984. It follows the story of a fictional rock band that tries to get a recording contract. ==Cast== * John Stamos – Gino Minnelli (guitar) * Jami Gertz – Martha Spino (vocals) * Cain Devore – Phil Taylor (bass) * Albert Macklin – Morris Weiner (drums) * Valerie Stevenson – Lisa Copley (vocals/piano) * Sandy Freeman – Louise Franconi * Ron Karabatsos – Frank Franconi ==Episodes== {| class=wikitable style="background:white" |- style="color:white" ! style="background:#660033; width:20px"| ! style="background:#660033"| Title ! style="background:#660033; width:120px"| Directed by ! style="background:#660033; width:90px"| Written by ! style="background:#660033; width:120px"| Original air date |} == Soundtrack == == External links == * Category:1984 American television series debuts Category:1984 American television series endings Category:1980s American musical comedy television series Category:1980s American sitcoms Category:CBS original programming Category:Television shows set in Philadelphia Category:Television series created by Andy Borowitz
title: Dreams (TV series)
